name: God, Gold & Goblins
description:
God, Gold & Goblins
  • You can move objects by dragging thems and you can double tap to add gold.
  • I made this game for the Ninja Gamejam, the theme was  "You Control The Game, Not The Character". I did a kind of RTS in wich the player is with neither team, you can only interact with the goblins tribes by manipulating the scenery in the manner of a god. There is no condition of victory so just have fun and experiment things!
